txt.en: 'The Orcs must be stopped before they raze the Wildwood to the ground!'
'Fewer Orcs in the Wildwood means more trees. Well done, little one.'
Defeated Tarkríp fire-starters ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Tarkríp tree-reavers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated Tarkríp tree-reavers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Thornmane is in the southern Wildwood.\n\nYou should talk to Thornmane.
Talk to Thornmane
DNT - Defeat Wildwood Firestarters ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Fewer Orcs in the Wildwood means more trees. Well done, little one.'
Defeat Tarkríp fire-starters ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Well, little one, I must say that I am impressed with your deeds, hoom. This part of the forest is already starting to look and feel better. There is still work to be done, however, hoom ta-room.\n\n'The destruction I found as I passed through the Wildwood is quite troubling. I believed it to be the work of the Men of Trestlebridge, hummm. But while you were gone, I observed the twisted creatures responsible for felling and setting fire to the forest. You must stop the Orcs, [placeholder], lest their burning and hewing devastate all of the Wildwood.'
Orcs have been logging part of the Wildwood and must be stopped before they decimate the forest.

Retribution of the Trees
'The Orcs must be stopped before they raze the Wildwood to the ground!'
'The Orcs must be stopped before they raze the Wildwood to the ground!'
'Fewer Orcs in the Wildwood means more trees. Well done, little one.'
Tarkríp tree-reavers and tree-burners can be found in the central Wildwood.\n\nThornmane has asked you to defeat the Orcs who are wreaking havoc upon the Wildwood's forest.
